title: Commission Decision of 15 December 1994 amending Decision 93/467/EEC authorizing Member States to provide for derogations from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC, in respect of oak (Quercus L.) logs with bark attached, originating in Canada or the United States of America
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 December 1994 amending Decision 93/467/EEC authorizing Member States to provide for derogations from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC, in respect of oak (Quercus L.) logs with bark attached, originating  in Canada or the United States of America (94/812/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 93/467/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 3, '31 December 1994' is replaced by '31 December 1996'
2. In Annex I, part 7, '93/467/EEC' is replaced by '94/812/EC'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(2) OJ No L 92, 9. 4. 1994, p. 27.
(3) OJ No L 217, 27. 8. 1993, p. 49.
